Contact us

meta.container: w-full bg-surface min-h-svh flex px-4 py-12 items-center md:py-20 justify-center min-w-0
meta.details: Get started with this versatile contact form layout that offers direct communication options, including phone, email, and support tickets, alongside a consent checkbox for privacy policy, styled with shadcn/ui for clean consistency.
